attributes.action: Sack Toby Young as university regulator he's not fit for the job.
attributes.additional_details: How can students feel safe with a man with these views being their regulator?
attributes.background: Toby Young has regularly made sexist remarks about female anatomy once 'joking' he had his 'dick up her arse' in a photo with a colleague. He's pro eugenics for working class people and thinks working class students at Oxbridge are a stain. He thinks wheelchair access is political correctness.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments.

If you're concerned about the process for appointments to the Board of the Office for Students, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208774
